title: HARLEQUIN
author: DPape

comments.content: Wasn't able to spot a match, Dick but I assume that as you didn't identify it either, it might be custom (or customization). Found some similars at some point which you'd probably already be aware of. Drop them here anyway: [Radikal](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317073041/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nootype/radikal), [Brandon](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317073041/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/brandon), [Raleway](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317073041/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/raleway)
Ryuk: thanks for your efforts. Dick
